EmailTemplate.description: Notifies RS Partner that Loan application has been incomplete for 24 hours
EmailTemplate.name: RS Partner - Incomplete Application After 24 Hours
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Lead.Name}â€™s application has been left unfinished for 24 hours
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
{!Lead.Partner_Name__c},
This is a notification that {!Lead.Name} has not completed their BlueWave Solar Loan application in 24 hours. Please follow up with the customer to complete this application.
Sincerely, BlueWave Customer Care customercare@bluewavesolar.com (844) 786 - 4100
